slide1.title: Smart Identification for Safe Action
slide1.text: Saw an insect and wonder if it's dangerous? Just take a picture. Our AI instantly tells you what it is, if it poses a risk to you, and gives you clear, safe steps on how to act. From photo to action in seconds.

slide2.title: From Individual Fear to Collective Pattern
slide2.text: With every insect you identify, you help us map the wildlife activity in your neighborhood. See where the most reported insects are, identify risk patterns near you, and protect your family with the information we gather together.

slide3.title: Verifiable Civic and Ecological Contribution
slide3.text: Your curiosity becomes a public service. If you find something important, you can report it directly to health authorities. Plus, you're helping science monitor local wildlife. Be part of the solution!
